availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Madison County native. Son of Valentine M. White and Jane H. White. Married to Lucy Ann Taylor White on September 14, 1846. Father of Valentine White, William White, Elizabeth White, and Richard White, Jr. Farmer in Madison County in 1850. Owner of twenty-eight enslaved persons in Madison County in 1850. Farmer in Madison County in 1860. Owner of thirty-two enslaved persons in Madison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Division 1, p. 23.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Yates, p. 16.
Marriage Records: Kentucky Marriages, (Richmond, KY: Madison County Courthouse), film no. 000183314, p. 970.
Find A Grave, "Richard J White, Sr (1827-1894)," Memorial #19964153, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/19964153 (accessed December 7, 2018).
